T02D1407:111a-20: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D1407:111a-21: rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong ste //
T02D1407:111a-22: zhes pa ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang /
T02D1407:111a-23: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor bla na med pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1407:111a-24: rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin la bya ba 'dra bar sbyar bas mi gzhom mo //
T02D1407:111a-26: rgyu med par ni gzhom mi bya //
T02D1407:111a-28: go 'phang mtshungs par ma mthong ngo //
T02D1407:111a-29: rgyud de dang de dag la rgyu'am gtan tshigs med
T02D1407:111a-30: pas na dam tshig gi spyod pa sbas shing gang
T02D1407:111a-31: la spyod pa ming tsam yang sbyin par mi bya
T02D1407:111a-32: zhing skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la
T02D1407:111a-33: bshad par bya'o // khra sogs pho nya brgyad po la //
T02D1407:111a-34: drod dang da pa 'phel byed cing //
T02D1407:111a-35: zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i de kho na nyid phun sum tshogs pa ster bar nges pa ste /
T02D1407:111a-36: kun du khyab pa'i byang chub kyi lam du gnas pa'o //
T02D1407:111a-37: dad pa tsam gyis blang bya yi //
T02D1407:111a-39: dad pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni dad pa'i rgyus chos ston la /
T02D1407:111a-40: de la shes rab kyi rgyus de kho na nyid rig par byed pa'o //
T02D1407:111a-41: de skad du brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa las /
T02D1407:111a-42: nya phyis kyis min lag pas ma ni //
T02D1407:111b-0: @111b rig pa lce yis myong byas na //
T02D1407:111b-1: tshe ring nad kyang med pa'o //
T02D1407:111b-3: ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu ni //
T02D1407:111b-4: blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni //
T02D1407:111b-6: mthe'u chung zhes pa ni mthe'u chung ste sor mo tha ma'o //
T02D1407:111b-7: des rab tu bskul ba ni bskyod pa'o //
T02D1407:111b-8: de yang lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'i skye gnas su
T02D1407:111b-9: bcug pa las byung ba lces blangs na bcud kyis
T02D1407:111b-10: len 'grub par byed pas bde ba chen po bskyed
T02D1407:111b-12: sgrub pa rnam pa gsum du gnas //
T02D1407:111b-13: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po dman pa dang /
T02D1407:111b-14: 'bring dang mchog tu gyur pa 'di dag gi dbye ba'o //
T02D1407:111b-15: 'di dag ni dpal he ru ka bde mchog gi
T02D1407:111b-16: 'grel ba sgrub thabs rnams kyi gnas zhes bya ba
T02D1407:111b-17: las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad

T02D1407:111b-21: to // de la spyod pa rnams ni spyod pa'o //
T02D1407:111b-22: brtul zhugs ni mi'i rus pa'i phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1407:111b-23: dpa' bo zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba'o //
T02D1407:111b-25: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa'o //
T02D1407:111b-26: mtshan nyid dbye bar shes bya na //
T02D1407:111b-27: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa
T02D1407:111b-28: sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya ba 'ba' zhig
T02D1407:111b-29: ste / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po yongs su bsal te /
T02D1407:111b-30: thams cad kyi mgon po dpal dang ldan pa rdo
T02D1407:111b-31: rje slob dpon la phyag 'tshal te blo gros chen
T02D1407:111b-32: po dang ldan pas bzhi po gsang ba la rjes
T02D1407:111b-33: su spyad par bya zhing lung dang mi 'bral bar
T02D1407:111b-34: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan ma gsil byed dang
T02D1407:111b-37: chu tshags rnams bcad par bya'i //
T02D1407:111b-38: bslab pa de rnams dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1407:111b-39: ni sangs rgyas pa'i mu stegs kyi spyod par 'gyur
T02D1407:111b-40: ro // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1407:111b-41: la dmigs pa de lta bu ni lhag pa'i lha
T02D1407:111b-42: ro // gcig yin no // stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1407:111b-43: ye shes las byung ba dang gdug pa thams cad
T02D1407:111b-44: gzhig pa las skyes pa'i sngon po chen po rnam
T02D1407:111b-45: par 'gyur ba drag po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad
T02D1407:111b-46: ro // gcig yin no // pa / mche ba
T02D1407:111b-47: cung zad rnam par gtsigs pa ral pa la zla
T02D1407:111b-48: ba phyed kyis brgyan pa ral ba chen po 'phungs
T02D1407:112a-0: pa'i steng na sna tshogs rdo rje @112a * //
T02D1407:112a-2: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan cing /
T02D1407:112a-3: rgyan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1407:112a-4: stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can //
T02D1407:112a-5: skyil krung phyed pas shin tu gnas pa /
T02D1407:112a-6: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad cing 'dod pa
T02D1407:112a-7: dang gti mug las byung ba'i phrag dog dus mtshan

T02D1407:112a-11: dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rnams gyen phyogs su
T02D1407:112a-12: gzigs pa'o // rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i
T02D1407:112a-13: phyag gnyis kyis phag gdong ma la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1407:112a-14: te gnyis su med par dga' ba'o //
T02D1407:112a-15: phyag gzhan rnams na chos kyi 'khor lo dang /

T02D1407:112a-23: phyag gzhan gnyas na chos gos dang mi'i pags pa bsnams pa'i tshul can no //
T02D1407:112a-24: phag rgod mo ni kha dog dmar mo gcer bu
T02D1407:112a-25: spyan gsum pa skra grol pa rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D1407:112a-26: 'bar ba'o // g-yon pa na sa'i lhung bzed dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1407:112a-27: g-yas pa na chos kyi dbyangs kyi sgra 'khrol ba'i cang te'u'o //
T02D1407:112a-28: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud pa ni thugs rje chen pos dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1407:112a-29: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la gdol ba mo dang /
T02D1407:112a-36: de bzhin du rngon pa mo'o //
T02D1407:112a-44: brgyad pa ni dkar po ste /
T02D1407:112a-45: rim dang rim las bzlog par ro //
T02D1407:112a-46: tshul rnams ni bzhad pa dang /
T02D1407:112a-55: phyag na khar gsol lhung bzed dang /
T02D1407:112a-57: sgo ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid ni khro mo'i tshul du dgod pa ste /
T02D1407:112a-58: de zhi'i mtshan kyang 'di lta ste /
T02D1407:112b-0: rdo rje gtum @112b mo zhes pa dang /
T02D1407:112b-1: rdo rje srin mo nyid dang ni de bzhin du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02D1407:112b-2: de rnams ni drag mo'i tshul can gdul dka' thams cad za bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1407:112b-3: kha dog ni thal ka'i mdangs dang /
T02D1407:112b-4: ljang gu dang dmar po dang sngon po ste cher 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1407:112b-6: kha tv'am ga dang khar gsil ni phyag g-yon na'o //
T02D1407:112b-7: g-yas pa na ni chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1407:112b-8: cang te'u 'dzin pa phrag pa g-yon du chos gos bkal ba'o //
T02D1407:112b-9: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad
T02D1407:112b-10: kyis brgyan cing yi dags kyi steng na skyil krung
T02D1407:112b-12: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ma'o //
T02D1407:112b-14: chos gos gsum pa can dang /
T02D1407:112b-15: de nas zas phyis mi len pa dang /
T02D1407:112b-17: ji lta ba'i stan gcig pa dang //
T02D1407:112b-25: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po de rnams rnam par dag pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02D1407:112b-26: de yang gsung rab yan lag gcu gnyis dang /
T02D1407:112b-27: dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i tshul khrims la rab tu dga' ba dang /
T02D1407:112b-28: snying rje chen pos dga' zhing mdzes pa rnams so //
T02D1407:112b-29: de rnams dang lhan cig tu mngon par spyod cing
T02D1407:112b-30: rjes su zhugs nas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1407:112b-31: byas nas lhan cig tu mngon par rol pas phyag
T02D1407:112b-32: rgya chen po bde ba dang ldan par byas la
T02D1407:112b-33: bzlas pa bya'o // aom shr'i ma h'a su kha
T02D1407:112b-34: badzra he he kam a'a: hum h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1407:112b-35: bzlas pa bya'o // zhes bya'o // dam tshig gi
T02D1407:112b-36: kha zas rnams rab tu longs spyod cing spyod pa
T02D1407:112b-37: ni bya ba ste sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs so
T02D1407:112b-38: bzlas pa bya'o // zhes bya'o // // bhu su
T02D1407:112b-39: ku'i spyod pa ni bhu su ku ste za nyal
T02D1407:112b-40: 'chag gsum gyi spyod pa'i rim pas spyad par bya'o
T02D1407:112b-41: bzlas pa bya'o // zhes bya'o // // // de la 'di'i rim pa ni 'di ste /
T02D1407:112b-42: bhu zhes pa ni kha zas te /
T02D1407:112b-43: 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs nas de tsam zhig rjes su dran par byas pas bya ba yin gyi //
T02D1407:112b-44: sdug bsngal bsten pas ni 'di dag cung zad kyang bsam par bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1407:113a-0: su zhes pa ni nyal ba ste rnam par shes pa de dag la @113a * //
T02D1407:113a-1: ma rig pas nye bar mtshan pa'i sde dpung la
T02D1407:113a-2: sogs pa rnams dge ba'i dngos por mngon du bya'o
T02D1407:113a-3: // de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dri
T02D1407:113a-4: ma med pa'i rang bzhin can du mngon du byas
T02D1407:113a-5: // la'o // ku zhes pa ni 'chag tu 'gro ba ste /
T02D1407:113a-6: bshang gci tsam zhig 'dor du phyin la 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs te /
T02D1407:113a-7: de 'od gsal ba tsam zhig yongs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1407:113a-8: lus kyi tshor ba dang yul dang dbang po'i rang
T02D1407:113a-9: gi ngo bo dag tu ni bsam par mi bya'o
T02D1407:113a-10: // grong dang grong du zhes pa la sogs pa ni skyo bar gyur na rgyu bar bya'o //
T02D1407:113a-11: brtul zhugs spyad par zhes pa ni de nas pho
T02D1407:113a-12: nya mo'i nyid can la brtul zhugs can gyi sangs

T02D1407:113a-14: so // bdag gis kyang lam kar pho nya mo mthong na de bzhin du 'du'o //
T02D1407:113a-15: de las ni phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang bla
T02D1407:113a-16: na med pa mchog gi byang chub nyid yun ring
T02D1407:113a-17: ring por mi thogs par myur du bde bar nges
T02D1407:113a-18: par 'thob po // de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas so //
T02D1407:113a-19: rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid 'dis rtag tu bsam gtan
T02D1407:113a-20: la sbyar na sems rin po che brtan par 'gyur

T02D1407:113a-23: lo grangs bcu drug ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

T02D1407:113b-13: kyi gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i don

T02D1407:113b-23: dbang bskur thob pa nges legs pa //

T02D1407:113b-25: sems kyi bdag nyid tho rang sa langs //

T02D1407:114a-10: h'um dag las rnam par snang mdzad dang /

T02D1407:114a-21: yid rnams ni aom h'um tr'am a'am kham ham las gti mug dang /
T02D1407:114a-26: dbang phyug rdo rje rnams so //
T02D1407:114a-27: dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram las gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1407:114a-28: lam m'am pam t'am las sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang kham las nam mkha' ste /
T02D1407:114a-33: rdo rje phag mo rnams so //
T02D1407:114a-34: aom a'a: hum h'um ste de rnams las sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02D1407:114a-35: chos kyi 'khor lo ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la bhr'um a'am dzr'i kham ste /
T02D1407:114a-37: mtshams rnams su a'a a'i a'u aee'o //
T02D1407:114a-38: longs spyod 'khor lo ni chu skyes 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1407:114a-39: aom a ai au ae dbyangs yig lnga po de rnams dgod pa'o //
T02D1407:114a-40: bde ba chen po ni chu skyes 'dab ma sum
T02D1407:114a-41: cu rtsa gnyis pa la lte bar yi ge ham
T02D1407:114a-42: ngo // sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni chu skyes 'dab
T02D1407:114a-43: ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la lte bar aa ka
T02D1407:114a-44: tsa ta ta pa ya sha ste /
T02D1407:114a-45: sde tshan brgyad po rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D1407:114a-46: zla ba dang nyi ma'i rnam par gsungs pa ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi sna bug go //
T02D1407:114a-47: sgo bcu drug tu gsungs pa las kha 'og tu
T02D1407:114a-48: bltas pas yi ge ka la sogs pa'i dbus su
T02D1407:114a-49: thim par shes par bya ste /
T02D1407:114a-50: de la pu ll'ir ma la ya la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnas so //
T02D1407:114a-51: de yang pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a
T02D1407:114a-52: k'a ao tro ko ka la k'a hi pre gri
T02D1407:114a-53: soo su n'a si ma ku rnams so //
T02D1407:114a-54: der dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams gnas pa ni /
T02D1407:114a-55: kham pram mam tsam kam pram bim mam sum b'am aam kham bam lam bam drum /
T02D1407:114b-0: aam aem bam mam mam bam bam sum sum sham bam @114b sum mam ham bam khem /
T02D1407:114b-1: mam tsam ram kham ham sam aom tsam shrim sum pam mam bam tsam bam mam /
T02D1407:114b-28: sen mo la rab tu gtum mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-29: skra dang ba spu la rab tu gtum mig can ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-30: pags pa dang dri ma la 'od ldan ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-32: rgyus pa la dpa' bo'i blo can no //
T02D1407:114b-33: rus pa la mi'u thung ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-34: glo ba la srin po'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-35: snying la ni shing grib ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-36: mig gnyis la ni sa srung ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-37: mkhris pa la 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-38: mkhal ma gnyis la ni rlung gi shugs ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-39: rgyu ma la ni chang 'thung ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-40: gnye ma la lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-41: lto ba la ni shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-42: lgang pa la rta rna ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-43: mtshog ma'i srubs la bya gdong ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-44: snabs la 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-47: rdul la 'khor lo'i mtshon cha ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-48: pho ba la shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-49: mchin pa la stobs chen mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-50: lud pa la ni 'khor lo bskor ma'o //
T02D1407:114b-51: sna chu la ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o //
T02D1407:114b-52: de lta bu'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1407:114b-53: gyi lus ni chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags
T02D1407:114b-54: so // sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag spyad //
T02D1407:114b-55: rnal 'byor ma rnams gnas su bstan //
T02D1407:114b-56: zhes pa ni de ltar bshad do //
T02D1407:114b-57: mtshon cha rnams bgom par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D1407:114b-58: ni smin gyi dam pa bdud rtsi rnams te mi
T02D1407:114b-59: bskyod pa bsten pas ni rnal 'byor pa nad thams
T02D1407:114b-61: rtag pas ni mdangs chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:114b-62: 'dod dpag tu med pas ni stobs chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:115a-0: @115a * // rdo rje nyi mas ni mi rgas so //
T02D1407:115a-1: srog chags thams cad kyi yan lag las byung ba'i
T02D1407:115a-2: don yod par grub pas ni rgyal po chen por
T02D1407:115a-3: te don thams cad yod par 'grub cing dpal dang
T02D1407:115a-4: ldan pa de ni rnal 'byor ma dam tshig dang
T02D1407:115a-6: rnal 'byor pas rtag tu mi bskyod pa 'thungs na tshe lo lnga brgyar 'tsho'o //
T02D1407:115a-7: rtag pas khri phrag gcig tu 'tsho bar gsungs so //
T02D1407:115a-8: rdo rje nyi mas ni bye bar ro //
T02D1407:115a-9: tshe dpag med kyis ni tshe dpag tu med par ro //
T02D1407:115a-10: rdo rje nyi ma dang 'od dpag tu med pa gnyis ni 'khor bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba ste /
T02D1407:115a-11: 'di dag rnal 'byor pas bsten na kun du bzang mo dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:115a-12: lus nyid dag pas byas nas ni //
T02D1407:115a-13: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag spyad //
T02D1407:115a-15: aom n'a n'a sa ma ya shuddha: sarba dharm'a n'a
T02D1407:115a-16: n'a sa ma ya shuddho& ham: aom sva bh'a wa
T02D1407:115a-17: shuddha:/ sarba rdarma: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1407:115a-18: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes so //
T02D1407:115a-19: rnal 'byor gnas rnams su zhes pa ni rang gi dbang bskur rdo rje'o //
T02D1407:115a-20: mtshon cha rnams ni bgom mi bya //
T02D1407:115a-21: zhes pa ni 'di yang dam tshig rnams yongs su bskyang bar bya'o //
T02D1407:115a-22: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:115a-23: rtsub mi smra zhes pa pa ni lam shin tu dag pa la gnas pa'o //
T02D1407:115a-24: mngon par brtson zhes pa ni bde mchog gi rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i bla ma dang /
T02D1407:115a-25: slob ma dang pho nya ni gang gi phyir mchog
T02D1407:115a-26: thob pa yin pa'i phyir na de lta bu la
T02D1407:115a-27: ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing bsod nams kyi
T02D1407:115a-28: tshogs bskal pa bye ba brgyar bsags pa can gyis
T02D1407:115a-29: kyang sdang bar byas na de'i skad cig nyid la
T02D1407:115a-31: des na de lta bu la sdang ba bsdam par brtson pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
T02D1407:115a-32: grol ba'i don dang de don du //
T02D1407:115a-33: zhes pa la grol ba'i don bdag gi lus gnas par bya ba'o //
T02D1407:115a-34: de'i don ni lus de'i don de bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1407:115a-35: mtshan mo rtag par gcer bu ste /
T02D1407:115a-37: mtshan mo zhes pa ni mtshan mo phyag rgyal mchod par bya ba'o //
T02D1407:115a-38: gnag dang dmar zhes pa la /
T02D1407:115a-39: nag pa ni he ru ka'i gzugs su bya ba'o //
T02D1407:115a-40: dmar zhes pa ni rdo rje phag mor bya ba'o //
T02D1407:115b-0: mgul @115b rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang /
T02D1407:115b-2: bde ba'i don thob bde ba ste /
T02D1407:115b-3: zhes pa ni ji ltar 'thob pa'i bde ba ste /
T02D1407:115b-4: des bde ba'i rang bzhin can phyogs bcu du mar
T02D1407:115b-5: gsal bar byed pa'i ye shes snang ba mar me
T02D1407:115b-6: lta bu la rnam par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor spyod
T02D1407:115b-7: pa snying rje chen po rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i
T02D1407:115b-8: bde ba dang ldan par ro //
T02D1407:115b-9: rigs dang rigs min dor mi blta //
T02D1407:115b-10: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba dang //
T02D1407:115b-11: bslab pa dag snying rje dang po'i las can gyi
T02D1407:115b-12: sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba byas na bsgom
T02D1407:115b-13: pa'i bar chad du 'gyur zhing gti mug chen por
T02D1407:115b-14: 'gro bas srid par bcings pa lta bur 'gyur ro
T02D1407:115b-15: // de'i phyir na 'ching ba las grol bar byas
T02D1407:115b-16: na skye ba 'di nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D1407:115b-17: // ro // des na de'i don du ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du gnas par bya'o //
T02D1407:115b-18: zhal bzhi ru gsungs pa ni dga' ba bzhi las byung zhing skyes pa'o //
T02D1407:115b-19: dga' ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D1407:115b-20: chub stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo gcig
T02D1407:115b-21: pu'i phyir na zhal gcig mar rab tu grags so
T02D1407:115b-22: // spyan gsum ni srid pa gsum du rab tu bshad do //
T02D1407:115b-23: thog ma dan tha ma med pa'i chos rnams bems
T02D1407:115b-24: po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir na ral pa'i don du
T02D1407:115b-25: gsungs so // sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don
T02D1407:115b-26: mdzad pa'i phyir na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par
T02D1407:115b-27: gsungs so // gyur pa'o // bde ba chen po'i
T02D1407:115b-28: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1407:115b-29: su 'gyur bas zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1407:115b-30: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis
T02D1407:115b-31: su 'gyur ba'i phyir na phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan
T02D1407:115b-32: pa'o // phyag rnams mtshan dang ldan pa ni yul
T02D1407:115b-33: dang dbang po gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor longs
T02D1407:115b-35: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems su 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:115b-36: dril bu ni shes rab tu bshad do //
T02D1407:115b-37: sku gsum rnam par dag pa'i phyir na rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D1407:115b-38: glang po'i pags pa ni gti mug dral ba'o //
T02D1407:115b-39: dgra sta ni skyon rnams gcod pa'o //
T02D1407:115b-40: lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba'i skyon rnams dang /
T02D1407:116a-0: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa @116a * //
T02D1407:116a-2: gri gug ni sems can gyi don rnams myur du byed pa'o //
T02D1407:116a-3: mgo bo ni tshangs pa'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1407:116a-4: kha tv'am ga ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1407:116a-5: cang te'u ni thabs rnam par dag pa rtag tu
T02D1407:116a-6: dga' ba'i gzugs kyis chos dbyings kyi h'um sgrogs par
T02D1407:116a-7: mdzad pa'o // thod pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu
T02D1407:116a-8: thugs rje'i ros nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang
T02D1407:116a-10: mche ba bzhi shin tu gtsigs pa ni bdud rnam pa bzhi la btab pa'o //
T02D1407:116a-11: 'od 'phros pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i me mtshams ni
T02D1407:116a-12: gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje'i ros rtag tu gang
T02D1407:116a-13: ba ste / cher bzhad cing zhal rnam par rgyas pa yang ngo //
T02D1407:116a-14: mgo bo'i do shal gyis mdzes pa ni nyon mongs pa bzhi'i bdud dag pa'o //
T02D1407:116a-15: stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni sdigs mdzub po //
T02D1407:116a-16: pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin //
T02D1407:116a-17: zhes pa ni rgyal ba rin po che rnams thams cad kyi bde ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na'o //
T02D1407:116a-18: gnyis pa zla ba yin par 'dod //
T02D1407:116a-20: zla ba ni bdud rtsi ste chang ngo //
T02D1407:116a-21: zas gcig tu za ba nyid nges pa ni ji
T02D1407:116a-22: ltar bya ba'i rigs du ma rnams gcig tu bskyed
T02D1407:116a-23: par bya ba'o // gtsang sbra 'di dag ces pa la sogs pa ni gsal lo //
T02D1407:116a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa rnams 'thob pa zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la bya'o //
T02D1407:116a-25: gang gi tshe brtson 'grus dman pas ma thob pa
T02D1407:116a-26: de'i tshe na yang sbrul gyi pags pa rnying pa
T02D1407:116a-27: bzhin du lus 'di yongs su bor nas gya nom
T02D1407:116a-28: snang la sogs par gnas te /
T02D1407:116a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhin du 'ching ba las grol lo //

T02D1407:116a-31: bsod nams dang ye shes las byung ba des byang
T02D1407:116a-32: chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bur sems can thams
T02D1407:116a-33: cad nye bar 'tsho zhing smon pa'i sems kyis sems
T02D1407:116a-34: can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed cing thams
T02D1407:116a-35: cad du phan 'dogs par byed do //
T02D1407:116a-36: skye zhing skye ba rnams su ni //
T02D1407:116a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye //
T02D1407:116a-38: zhes pa ni dpal sh'akya'i mgon po ji ltar 'khrungs pa de bzhin du'o //
T02D1407:116a-39: de'i phyir na bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad la
T02D1407:116b-0: sogs pa'i ngo bo la bza' @116b ba dang btung
T02D1407:116b-1: bar ldan pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1407:116b-2: dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1407:116b-3: zhes pa ni las gang 'dod pa rnams la dad
T02D1407:116b-4: pa ste zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa
T02D1407:116b-5: rnams so // nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcu zhes
T02D1407:116b-6: pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa ste
T02D1407:116b-7: rang gi mthe bong rdo rje brtan por sbyar la
T02D1407:116b-9: mdzub mo sbyar bar gnas pa dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su gzhag la /
T02D1407:116b-10: rim dang rim min bzlog par bskor bar byas la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1407:116b-11: aom a'a ralli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a
T02D1407:116b-12: ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho: zhes
T02D1407:116b-13: so // de lan gsum dang bzhi'i bar du brjod do //
T02D1407:116b-14: sgrub pa pho ni gcer bu skra grol par gyur
T02D1407:116b-15: pa gnas dgon par kha lho phyogs su bltas te
T02D1407:116b-16: gnas la mtshan phyed na gtor ma gtang ngo //
T02D1407:116b-17: 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma de gtang ba
T02D1407:116b-18: gnas dgon pa zhes pa de yang ri rab ri'i
T02D1407:116b-19: rgyal po mchog tu bzang por gsungs pa'i steng du
T02D1407:116b-21: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa tva ra na bzhis

T02D1407:116b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su zhu ba'i bdag nyid

T02D1407:116b-29: thams cad rab tu gnon pa /

T02D1407:116b-37: zhal drug pa phyag bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1407:116b-38: dpa' ba dang smre ba dang sgeg pa dang bzhad pa dang /
T02D1407:116b-40: zhal gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba ste sngon po dang /
T02D1407:116b-41: de bzhin du dmar po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D1407:117a-0: dkar po dang steng gi zhal ni drag @117a * //

T02D1407:117a-2: khyon ni nam mkha'i khyon tsam mo //

T02D1407:117a-15: phyag gnyis kyis ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas dpral ba'i steng du bzhag pa'o //
T02D1407:117a-16: phag mo'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan rnams kyang de bzhin no //

T02D1407:117a-32: g-yon pa rnams na lcags kyu dang /

T02D1407:117b-0: gang ba'i @117b steng na thod pa byang chub kyi
T02D1407:117b-1: sems 'o mas rab tu gang ba rnams so //

T02D1407:119a-22: rim pa lnga pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ni bam

T02D1407:119b-5: gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams te /
T02D1407:119b-7: btung ba'i snod can l'a ma'i kha dog go //

T02D1407:120a-31: pa'o // bya'o // bya'o // par bstan no //

T02D1407:120a-34: zhal bsil la dam tshig rnams la dam tshig gi sbyor bas sbyar te bza'/

T02D1407:120a-37: dbus su h'um nyid byas nas su //
T02D1407:120a-39: bya ba ji srid rab tu 'grub //
T02D1407:120a-41: rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye la sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /

T02D1407:120b-0: 'di dag ni dpal @120b he ru ka bde mchog
T02D1407:120b-1: gi 'grel pa sgrub thabs rnams kyi gnas zhes bya
T02D1407:120b-2: ba las le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par
T02D1407:120b-4: / de nas mchod pa rnam dag bdag //
T02D1407:120b-6: rnam dag ces pa ni dngos po thams cad so

T02D1407:120b-8: bde ba chen po rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o
T02D1407:120b-9: // de lta bu de nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1407:120b-10: de nas dpa' bo nges 'gro ba //
T02D1407:120b-11: zhes pa ni srid pa mnyam pa dag gis mi g-yo ba'i phyir na /
T02D1407:120b-12: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste //
T02D1407:120b-13: kun du bsags pa las 'khrungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1407:120b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su spyod pa'o //
T02D1407:120b-15: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'phrog pas sems cad kyi don mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni sprul ba'i sku'o //
T02D1407:120b-16: de'i bdag nyid can gyi bdag nyid rang gi lhag
T02D1407:120b-17: pa'i lha'i sbyor bas ji ltar nus pa mchod par
T02D1407:120b-18: bya'o // bdag nyid mchod par bya zhes pa ni de lta bur bshad do //
T02D1407:120b-19: don du spyad pa nyid kyang mchod //
T02D1407:120b-21: lhan cig thos pa dang bsam pa dag pa phun sum tshogs pa can te /
T02D1407:120b-22: rnal 'byor gcig la nges par byed pa rnams so //
T02D1407:120b-23: nyid ces pa'i sgra ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyang yang dag par gzung bar bya ste /

T02D1407:120b-26: zla ba 'dus par yang dag gnas //
T02D1407:120b-28: yang dag gnas zhes pa ni shes rab dang yang dag par sbyor bar 'gro ba'o //
T02D1407:120b-29: zla ba zhes pa ni chang ngo //
T02D1407:120b-30: yang na ni zla ba zhes pa ni bde ba'i ga pur te /
T02D1407:120b-31: rtag tu rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba skye ba'o //

T02D1407:120b-33: ba'i stong pa nyid du blta bar bya ba yin
T02D1407:120b-34: te / de lta bu'i sems ni bsgom par bya ba yin no //

T02D1407:120b-41: tshogs kyi 'khor lo ston pa dang /
T02D1407:121a-0: rdo rje'i glu thos par byed pa @121a * //
T02D1407:121a-2: dam tshig dag go bar byed na slob dpon de la smod cing brnyas pa dang /
T02D1407:121a-3: sems can thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1407:121a-5: sems can gzhan rnams kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:121a-6: de'i phyir na de byang chub kyi sems dri ma can du 'gro'o //

T02D1407:121a-10: gal to 'am brgya la byang chub tu sems bskyed
T02D1407:121a-11: pa snying rjes ma bcings pa yin na ni ji
T02D1407:121a-12: lta ba de bzhin du ste /
T02D1407:121a-13: de rnams la yang dag nyid kyis ni bstan par mi bya'i /
T02D1407:121a-14: de rnams gzhan la spyod du gzhug par bya ba yin te /
T02D1407:121a-15: der byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i dad pas de'i dbang du gting bar bya'o //
T02D1407:121a-16: de ltar na ni rtag tu dam tshig la sbyar par 'gyur ro //
T02D1407:121a-17: rtag tu dam tshig spyad byas 'gyur //
T02D1407:121a-18: zhes pa'i don ni de ltar ro //
T02D1407:121a-19: gsang sngags su la'ang mi sbyin no //

T02D1407:121a-24: nyon mongs pa mtha' yas par yongs su dag par skyes par byed de //
T02D1407:121a-25: nyon mongs pa rnams ni glo bur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1407:121a-27: dper na nam mkha' la kha ba dang du ba

T02D1407:121a-29: po de rnam par bsal bar byas na ni /
T02D1407:121a-30: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du tshe 'di nyid la 'gyur ba'o //

T02D1407:121a-37: rgyal srid dang bral ba'i mi lta bu'o //

T02D1407:121a-41: pho nyar chags pa rnam thar pa //

T02D1407:121b-1: pho nya mo la chags pas yang dag par grol ba'o //

T02D1407:124b-39: tsher ma shin tu rnon po dang /

T02D1407:124b-41: gas pa dag las sor bcu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i
T02D1407:124b-42: cha rnams dug dang khrag dang til mar la sbangs
T02D1407:124b-43: pa shin tu rno ba rnams yam shing du sbyin
T02D1407:125a-0: @125a * // dri dku ba can gyi til dang /
T02D1407:125a-3: shing nim pa'i lo ma dang /
T02D1407:125a-4: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D1407:125a-7: rnga mo la sogs pa'i sbangs dang /
T02D1407:125a-8: skra dang mar khu chen po dang /
T02D1407:125a-12: mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang /
T02D1407:125a-14: sha la sogs pa ji ltar rnyed pa gcig tu bya'o //
T02D1407:125a-15: rdzas de rnams kyang dug dang khrag dang /
T02D1407:125a-16: smyo byed kyi 'dab mar bsregs pa dang /
T02D1407:125a-19: phub ma la sogs pa las gdug pa can gyi
T02D1407:125a-20: gzugs brnyan byas la mtshon shin tu rnon pos mgo
T02D1407:125a-23: mngon spyod kyi bsreg rdza su bya'o //
T02D1407:125a-24: de yang lcags kyi snod du khrag dang /
T02D1407:125a-27: bod bu'i gci bar bsres te gzhag pa mngon spyod
T02D1407:125a-28: la yi ge phat mtha' mar bzhag pa'i yi ge
T02D1407:125a-29: bdun pa'i sngags lan bdun bdun bzlas shing bsreg par
T02D1407:125a-30: bya'o // de yang dkon mchog gsum la bsdo ba dang /
T02D1407:125a-31: dam tshig las nyams pa dang /
T02D1407:125a-32: sdang ba can dag la bya ba ni nag pos
T02D1407:125a-33: brgyan cing lcags kyi rgyan cha can gyi sngags pa
T02D1407:125a-35: kho bo'i skyil mo krung gis shing khri'i stan la
T02D1407:125a-36: yang dag par gnas la mtshan phyed nyi ma phyed
T02D1407:125a-37: na bsgrub bya la bsam par bya'o //
T02D1407:125a-38: re phas ni me'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1407:125a-39: mtha' mar h'um dang phat kyi sgra mdzad pa 'brug sgra lta bur brjod do //
T02D1407:125a-40: de nas thog ma dang dbus dang mtha' mar bya
T02D1407:125a-41: ba'i me ni dur khrod kyi me dang lag pas
T02D1407:125a-42: bton pa dang / rdo las bton pa dang /
T02D1407:125a-43: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba ni mngon spyod la shis so //
T02D1407:125a-44: thog ma kho nar me thab tu ji skad smras
T02D1407:125a-45: pa'i bud shing bzhag pa la me bcug pa rlung
T02D1407:125a-46: yab kyis pa ka'i me spar ro //
T02D1407:125a-47: sngags ni h'um dzva la h'um zhes brjod cing me sbar bar rig par bya'o //
T02D1407:125a-48: de nas lag pa g-yas par ku sha bcug ste /
T02D1407:125a-49: mthe bong srin lag gi rtsar bzhag la me dgug par bya'o //
T02D1407:125a-50: sngags ni aom ae hye hi mah'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi tvi dzva stva mi /
T02D1407:125a-51: gri hi tv'a aa h'u tim aa h'a ram aa
T02D1407:125b-0: smin sanni hi to @125b bha ba zhes pa 'dis
T02D1407:125b-1: thab kyi me'o phyogs su 'ongs par bsam mo //
T02D1407:125b-2: 'dir 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i dbus su khro bo mi
T02D1407:125b-3: bzad par byed pa zhes pa bkug la gzhag pa
T02D1407:125b-4: glog 'khyug pa lta bu ba spu ser po can
T02D1407:125b-5: de bzhin du kha dog dud kha de nas mig
T02D1407:125b-6: g-yo zhing steng phyogs su rna ba nyan pa ltar
T02D1407:125b-7: mdzad cing sgra chen po sgrogs pa mche ba bzhi
T02D1407:125b-8: pa stobs chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor la zhon
T02D1407:125b-9: pa // rab tu 'jigs shing h'um mdzad pas h'um sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D1407:125b-12: brjod pa chen po rdo rje'i 'od can /
T02D1407:125b-13: rig pa'i khri la gnas pa /
T02D1407:125b-17: mya ngan byed pa'i tshul can dud pa'i phreng ba 'khrigs shing 'bar ba /
T02D1407:125b-18: lcags las byas pa'i rgyan rnams dang ldan pa /
T02D1407:125b-19: bzhin bzang po lcags kyis khebs pa /
T02D1407:125b-22: mi g-yo ba'i tshul can na bza' sngon po bsnams pa /
T02D1407:125b-23: 'jigs pa'i dus ltar mnyam par 'bar ba drag po
T02D1407:125b-24: 'jig rten gsum po za ba lta bur rngam pa
T02D1407:125b-26: rdo rje steng du 'phyar ba ltar 'dzin pa gzhan gnyis na ral gri dang gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1407:125b-27: de'i g-yas su ni so sor zhes bya ba phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1407:125b-28: rdo rje dang gri gug lag na bsnams pa /
T02D1407:125b-31: ma mchu tshems kyi sgros mnan pa'o //
T02D1407:125b-32: de nyid ki g-yon na ni khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste /
T02D1407:125b-33: rang gi rigs su gnas pa /
T02D1407:125b-34: khrag gi phreng ba mnyam par 'bar ba'o //
T02D1407:125b-35: g-yon du ni gshin rje mthar 'byin char sprin lta
T02D1407:125b-36: bur 'jigs pa'i mdog can zhal gsum phyag drug pa
T02D1407:125b-39: mtshe ba rnam pa gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1407:125b-40: lcags las byas pa'i rgyan gyis 'bar ba can /
T02D1407:125b-41: dur khrod kyi me ltar 'bar ba /
T02D1407:125b-42: ma he la zhon par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1407:125b-43: snying gar ni 'jam dpal gyi dngos po bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1407:125b-44: thab kyi mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs gnyis su ni mthar byed dang dus can zhes pa dag ste /
T02D1407:126a-1: bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du bsam par bya ba ste /
T02D1407:126a-2: bkres pa'i tshul la shing za ba'i don la 'dod pa'i phyag gnyis drag po'i cha byad can /
T02D1407:126a-3: ji lta bu'i yi dags kyi bdag po'i rgyal po de bzhin du ste /
T02D1407:126a-4: bsreg rdzas za bar 'dod pa can du bya ba ni drag po'i las la rab tu bsam pa'o //
T02D1407:126a-5: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs su yang
T02D1407:126a-6: dag par gyur pas ni sgrub pa po'i don thams
T02D1407:126a-7: cad nas thams cad du 'grub pa'o //
T02D1407:126a-8: sngags dang phyag rgya dang rnal 'byor rnams ni las
T02D1407:126a-9: dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su ldan par bya
T02D1407:126a-10: zhing sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs par byas
T02D1407:126a-11: pa la mchod yon la sogs pas mchod par bya'o
T02D1407:126a-12: // de yang mchod yon ni dbu la'o //
T02D1407:126a-14: aom aargham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes pas aargham dbul lo //
T02D1407:126a-15: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02D1407:126a-16: mthe bong gi rtse mo skam pa'i kha ltar sprad
T02D1407:126a-17: de mdzes par bskor ba'i tshul gyis gyen du bstan
T02D1407:126a-18: te / ku sha chu gtsang la spangs la zhabs la dbul lo //
T02D1407:126a-19: aom p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes pas phul te /
T02D1407:126a-20: de nas zhal bsil yang phul la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod do //
T02D1407:126a-21: de la me tog ni dbu la'o //
T02D1407:126a-23: dri chu ni thugs kar ro //
T02D1407:126a-25: de bzhin du lha bshos kyang mdun du ste gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1407:126a-26: de nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bsreg rdzas su sbyin no //
T02D1407:126a-27: de nas yang de lta bu'i yang dag par mchod
T02D1407:126a-28: pa rnams kyis gang la phan par bya ba ste
T02D1407:126a-29: / mi 'byor na yang yid kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi khyad par gyis so //
T02D1407:126a-30: de nas yang zhal bsil phul te /
T02D1407:126a-31: gong du ste sngon du yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1407:126a-32: dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid la dgang gzar
T02D1407:126a-33: ni sor bzhi pa'i tshad la dbyibs gru gsum pa
T02D1407:126a-34: thur du sor gnyis kyi tshad du brkos pa /
T02D1407:126a-35: kha ran la rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1407:126a-36: 'di'i nang gi gra gsum la mtshan ma dag gzhag par bya ba yin te /
T02D1407:126a-38: sbrul dang seng ge'i gdong rnams ji ltar btub tshad du bri'o //
T02D1407:126b-0: mar kyi [*gyi] @126b 'dzag khung ni sor gcig pa'i tshad la /
T02D1407:126b-1: rtse mo yang sor gcig pa rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1407:126b-2: de yi yu ba ni sor bcu drug pa'i tshad dang ldan pa can no //
T02D1407:126b-3: de nas blugs gzar ni yu ba sor bcu pa can /
T02D1407:126b-4: gzar bu nyid ni sor gsum pa'i tshad la gru gsum pa'i dbyibs te /
T02D1407:126b-5: dbus su sor gcig brkos pa gang gi mtshan mas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1407:126b-6: 'og gi mchu yang de bzhin du sor gsum pa
T02D1407:126b-7: la rtse mo gsum pa kha gyes pa'i rdo rjes
T02D1407:126b-9: 'di lta bu'i dgang gzar dang blugs gzar ni mngon spyod kyi'o //
T02D1407:126b-10: de yang rdo rje brgyab pa'i shing nga ma /
T02D1407:126b-12: yang na tsher ma shin tu rnon po can la sogs pa la bya'o //
T02D1407:126b-13: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig / ces pa'i don ni de lta bu'o //
T02D1407:126b-14: de dag ni phyi'i sbyin sreg tu gsungs so //
T02D1407:126b-15: yang nang gi bdag nyid gsungs pa //
T02D1407:126b-16: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
T02D1407:126b-17: de bzhin dpa' bo'i ston mo ni //
T02D1407:126b-19: sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams dang //
T02D1407:126b-20: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis nyon mongs
T02D1407:126b-21: pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i don
T02D1407:126b-22: dang / bsam gtan gyi nyams chen por bya ba'i ched du /
T02D1407:126b-23: sa gsum gyi gnyen po'i thab khung du las thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1407:126b-24: lte bar rang gi ngo bos skyes pa'i drag 'dzin
T02D1407:126b-25: ma'i me shin tu gsal ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin la
T02D1407:126b-27: dpal he ru kas gang ba 'dir sreg blugs ni
T02D1407:126b-28: rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D1407:126b-30: de ni bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te /
T02D1407:126b-31: phyi'i dngos po mtha' dag rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1407:126b-32: de ltar yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D1407:126b-35: lte bar de ltar bsgom pa'i me //
T02D1407:126b-36: lte bar thab khung nyid du gsungs //
T02D1407:126b-37: thams cad bud shing ye shes me //
T02D1407:127a-1: kyi rlung gis bud pa na //
T02D1407:127a-2: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la sbar //
T02D1407:127a-3: thams cad dbang po dngos skyes pa //
T02D1407:127a-4: bsregs pas sems nyid bde bar 'gyur //
T02D1407:127a-5: las dang skye ba srid skyes pa'i //
T02D1407:127a-6: nyon mongs zhi bar bya phyir bsreg /'di las rgyas pa'i 'byung ba ni //
T02D1407:127a-7: rim pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur //
T02D1407:127a-8: bskal pa'i me dang mnyam lta zhing //
T02D1407:127a-9: me de snang ba bzhin gnas pa //
T02D1407:127a-10: snying ga'i gnas na 'bar ba ni //
T02D1407:127a-11: rtsa nyid brgyad po'i dbus na'o //
T02D1407:127a-12: me yi dbus na padmo nyid //
T02D1407:127a-13: 'dab ma drug cu bzhi lta bu'o //
T02D1407:127a-14: de yid dbus na me yi lha //
T02D1407:127a-15: 'od ldan mtheb tshon tsam pa blta //
T02D1407:127a-16: me yi mdog can phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1407:127a-17: rang bzhin dga' ba gsal ba nyid //
T02D1407:127a-18: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02D1407:127a-20: rtsa rnams kun la gnas par blta //
T02D1407:127a-21: thams cad 'bar ba'i dbyibs can te //
T02D1407:127a-22: 'dab ma'i grangs rnams sngon du gsungs //
T02D1407:127a-23: lte ba'i bud shing rtag bsreg cing //
T02D1407:127a-24: de nyid yid ni me tog mchod //
T02D1407:127a-25: yid de'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang //
T02D1407:127a-26: yid de'i dri de dri mchog go //
T02D1407:127a-27: yid de mar me gsal ba ste //
T02D1407:127a-28: yid de'i cho gas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1407:127a-29: gtor ma'i 'du byed gang bar yang //
T02D1407:127a-30: yid kyi cho ga nyid kyis so //
T02D1407:127a-31: brkyang ma dgang gzar yin par gsungs //
T02D1407:127a-32: ro ma de bzhin blugs gzar te //
T02D1407:127a-34: sor gnyis tshad du rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1407:127a-35: rang gi rdo rje ji srid par //
T02D1407:127a-36: yu ba'i rdo rje rin chen ldan //
T02D1407:127a-37: bsreg rdzas snod ni thod pa ste //
T02D1407:127a-38: yam shing rdzas rnams thams cad do //
T02D1407:127a-39: 'di ni cho ga'i rim par bshad //
T02D1407:127a-41: rtsa lnga la kun gyi bzhi'o //
T02D1407:127a-42: lnga po 'di dag par sbyar te //
T02D1407:127a-43: sa dang chu dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams mnyam
T02D1407:127a-44: par lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa chu shing gi
T02D1407:127a-46: sgo dmar po rtag tu gnas shing 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1407:127a-47: po rtag tu gyen du bltas pa ge sar dmar
T02D1407:127a-48: po dang yang dag par ldan par mkhas pa rnams
T02D1407:127a-49: kyis yang dang yang du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1407:127a-50: de'i dbus su ji skad du gsungs pa'i rnam par shes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i lha /
T02D1407:127b-0: nam mkha'i rlung gi ngo bos @127b rdzogs par gsal
T02D1407:127b-1: ba rdul phra rab tsam gyi mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D1407:127b-2: rnam par shes pa 'od zer can skra brgya'i rtse
T02D1407:127b-3: mo'i cha tsam rgyun du gnas pa la /
T02D1407:127b-4: mar me lta bu rab tu gsal ba'i thig le yi ge med pa'i ri mos /
T02D1407:127b-6: sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T02D1407:127b-7: sor mo lnga yis yang dag par sbyar bas na /
T02D1407:127b-8: bsreg bya'i dgang blugs sbyin par gsungs so //
T02D1407:127b-9: 'dir dgang blugs sor gsum pa ni //
T02D1407:127b-11: bsreg par bya ba'i rim pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D1407:127b-12: bdud rtsi'i yi ges yang dag par ldan pa dang /
T02D1407:127b-13: yi ge gsum mchog gi de kho na nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na mos so //
T02D1407:127b-14: bsregs pa'i rim pas char pa'i rgyun lta bur nyin
T02D1407:127b-15: mtshan du ga pur gyi rgyun bde ba chen po'i
T02D1407:127b-16: bdud rtsi'i rgyun thams cad drangs te /
T02D1407:127b-18: lus der mchog tu bsdus pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du zhugs par gyur te /
T02D1407:127b-19: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni de lta bur gsungs so //
T02D1407:127b-20: rgyas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyis mgu ste shin tu 'grol ba'o //
T02D1407:127b-21: shin tu zhi bar bya ba'i don du ni /
T02D1407:127b-22: khro bo'i gzugs kyi khyad par du bya'o //
T02D1407:127b-23: rjes su chags pa la ni /
T02D1407:127b-24: rnam par bkra ba'i bud med kyi gzugs su rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1407:127b-25: phyag rgya ni bud med du gsungs te //
T02D1407:127b-26: sku gsung thugs la rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1407:127b-27: sum mdor me'i dkyil du rang byung gi lhag pa'i lha bsams la /
T02D1407:127b-28: snod shin tu bkra shis pa'i snod las bsreg rdzas
T02D1407:127b-29: de nyid phul ba ni las thams cad pa ste
T02D1407:127b-30: / dpa' bos gnyis su med pas snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1407:127b-31: aom a'a: bam h'um sngags kyis de'i lus su bskyed
T02D1407:127b-32: la h'a h'a dang sa sh'i d'a zhes pa'i sgra
T02D1407:127b-33: gnyis po yang dag par zlos shing /
T02D1407:127b-34: ji ltar bde bar 'gyur ba na ga pur rang
T02D1407:127b-35: bzhin gyi dga' ba rab tu gsal ba me'i dkyil
T02D1407:127b-37: 'jig pa'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od lta bu der phung po lnga po mtha' dag med par /
T02D1407:127b-39: de lta bus ni phung po thal bar song yang 'tsho ba ste /
T02D1407:128a-0: @128a * // chos rnams kyi rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid snying rje chen po dang /
T02D1407:128a-1: smon lam gyis bskyed pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par gsal ba'o //
T02D1407:128a-2: 'dis ni rgyas pa ste bde ba chen po yang
T02D1407:128a-3: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkyil 'khor du 'byung
T02D1407:128a-4: bas na'o // zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu zhi ba'i don te /
T02D1407:128a-5: shin tu stong pa nyid gzhi med pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bu'o //
T02D1407:128a-6: dbang ni phyag rgya chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa yin no //
T02D1407:128a-7: dpal he ru ka'i sprul pa ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1407:128a-8: khams gsum po dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1407:128a-10: sangs rgyas rnams ji lta bar ni sems can rnams par de bzhin te /
T02D1407:128a-11: gnyis su med pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid pas so //
T02D1407:128a-12: bstan pa kun rnams shes zhes pa ni /
T02D1407:128a-13: sangs rgyas kyis de kho na nyid du bsdus par ro //
T02D1407:128a-14: de lta bu'i dpa' bo'i phyag rgya dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba ni ston mor gsungs so //
T02D1407:128a-15: gzhan yang dam tshig bzang po rnams kyi dngos grub
T02D1407:128a-16: nye bar bskyed par bya zhing gzhan yang bdag nyid
T02D1407:128a-17: kyi ma yin pa gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba'i
T02D1407:128a-18: rdzas ni ma yin zhing kha na ma tho ba
T02D1407:128a-19: med par gnas pa g-yeng ba med pas sna tshogs
T02D1407:128a-20: pa las byung ba'i 'o ma'i mchog gis de bzhin
T02D1407:128a-21: gshegs pa thams cad la gnyis su med pa'i sems
T02D1407:128a-23: gzungs zhes pa ni rtag tu nye bar mi btang bar bya'o //
T02D1407:128a-24: de bas na rtag tu mchod ces pa ste /
T02D1407:128a-25: de ltar rtag tu mchod do zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1407:128a-27: bgegs med ces pa 'di ni rtag tu dam tshig spyad pas na'o //
T02D1407:128a-28: gang zhig ji bzhin 'grub ces pa ni phyag rgya chen po la'o //
T02D1407:128a-30: zhes pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub ste /
T02D1407:128a-32: pho nya mo mchog bzang mo dang //
T02D1407:128a-33: nye bar rtag tu ldan bya zhing //
T02D1407:128a-34: brtson par lhan cig mnyam ldan pas //
T02D1407:128a-35: shin tu chags dga'i longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D1407:128a-37: pho nya mo mchog bzang mo zhes pa dang /

T02D1407:138b-6: pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /

T02D1407:138b-26: de'i dbus na stong pa nyid kyi ri mo la

T02D1407:138b-29: cad yang dag par bskul te bstims la /

T02D1407:138b-42: aom h'um aam aa: kham ham sa bon de dag gis gti mug dang /
T02D1407:138b-44: de bzhin du nga rgyal dang /
T02D1407:139a-0: dbang phyug rdo rje ste de dag rnams @139a * //

T02D1407:139a-7: 'di dag ni phung po dang khams dang /
T02D1407:139a-9: phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sku ji ltar sems
T02D1407:139a-10: la 'dod pa rdzogs par bsgom zhing 'gro ba gsum
T02D1407:139a-11: po ma lus pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dkyil
T02D1407:139a-12: 'khor du rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1407:139a-13: aom a'a: h'um dang ho: dmar po gnyis kyi bar
T02D1407:139a-14: du bcug pa yig lnga po dri za'i sems can
T02D1407:139a-15: lta bu nam mkha'i phyogs su bltas la /

T02D1407:139a-17: pa ste snying gar bcug la sku gnyis rjes su
T02D1407:139a-18: chags pa 'dod chags chen po'i mes chu skyes la

T02D1407:139a-29: 'phral du spyan rgyas par byas nas /
T02D1407:139a-30: sgra brnyan lta bur glu 'di dag gis mgon po rab tu bskul lo //
T02D1407:139a-31: kye khyod kyis sa gsum bde ba brnyes pa ste //
T02D1407:139a-32: padmar chags pa spongs mdzod aa la la la la ho //
T02D1407:139a-33: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen rgyal ba'i tshogs //
T02D1407:139a-34: bde gshegs snying po rab spongs aa la la la la ho //
T02D1407:139a-35: khyod ni dam pa'i chos rnams ston pa'i gzhi //
T02D1407:139a-36: yul las bde brnyes sa gsum snying po nyid //
T02D1407:139a-37: aa la la la la ho bde ba'i bdag po khyod //
T02D1407:139a-38: spongs mdzod spongs mdzod sku che rgyal ba'i gtso //
T02D1407:139a-39: glu 'di dag gis bskul ma thag tu yi ge

T02D1407:139a-41: / 'di lta bu ni mngal nas skyes pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1407:139a-42: yang na rus sbal gyis zhes pa ni rus sbal gyi ste sgo nag las skyes pa'o //
T02D1407:139a-43: de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1407:139b-0: skad cig tsam gyi sbyor bas lha'i dngos @139b por

T02D1407:139b-2: shes kyi rgyun nyon mongs pa med cing //
T02D1407:139b-3: rtag pa dang chad pa med pa ste snying rje can po dang /

T02D1407:139b-7: 'di lta bu ni mi g-yo ba la gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1407:139b-8: phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa //
T02D1407:139b-9: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni gnyis kar yang dag par nye bar sbyor ro //
T02D1407:139b-10: dkar po sku zhes pa ni /
T02D1407:139b-11: rdo rje 'chang gi khyad par te //
T02D1407:139b-12: lha thams cad cho ga bzhin du shes par byas la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1407:139b-13: sems kyis 'di las gzhan du skad cig kyang blo
T02D1407:139b-14: chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis gnas par mi
T02D1407:139b-15: bya // dngos grub kyi don 'ba' zhig tu bsam par bya'o //
T02D1407:139b-16: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang

T02D1407:139b-19: 'di dag ni dpal he ru ka bde mchog gi

T02D1407:139b-25: tu bde ba phag rgya'i dngos grub kyi thabs mchog
T02D1407:139b-26: tu gyur pa gzhan med de //
T02D1407:139b-27: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po mkha' gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa di yin pas so //
T02D1407:139b-28: 'di las sgrub pa po rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med de //
T02D1407:139b-29: bsod nams kyi tshogs pa zhen po skyed par byed pa'i phyir na'o //
T02D1407:139b-30: de'i phyir na tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1407:139b-31: de yang 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdo
T02D1407:139b-32: rnams bsdus pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o

T02D1407:139b-37: pang g-yon mgul pa 'khyud byas nas //
T02D1407:139b-38: zhes pa ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i pho nya mo
T02D1407:139b-39: rigs dang ldan par dag rang gi yan lag g-yon
T02D1407:140a-0: @140a * // pa gnyis kyis pang du bzhag ste /
T02D1407:140a-1: gdong pa rang la bstan te sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1407:140a-2: gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya //
T02D1407:140a-4: dpa' bo la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1407:140a-5: ma dang yang na sring mo'am //
T02D1407:140a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa la //

T02D1407:140a-8: rnam par ma dag pa gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
T02D1407:140a-9: des na de dag thams cad la bdag nyid mchod par bya ba'i don du 'jug par bya ba'o //
T02D1407:140a-12: shin tu bcings las grol ba'o //
T02D1407:140a-14: de ni bag chags rnams las shi tu grol ba'i don to //
T02D1407:140a-17: 'grub ces pa ni bag chags rnams bcom pa'i phyir na'o //
T02D1407:140a-18: slob dpon lus su gnas nas su //
T02D1407:140a-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur thams cad du dmigs par bya ba'o //
T02D1407:140a-21: de nas re zhig dpa' bo dang dpa' mo nyid du rnam par spyod de //
T02D1407:140a-22: dngos po med pa las langs la zung du 'jug
T02D1407:140a-23: pa'i rim pa'i rgyun gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon
T02D1407:140a-24: du byed pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1407:140a-25: gyi yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas te

T02D1407:140a-32: bka' tsam gyis 'grub par the tshom mi za'o //
T02D1407:140a-33: 'di dag ni dpal he ru ka bde mchog gi

T02D1407:140a-40: dang rab tu sbyor ba de thams cad ni sgrub

T02D1407:140a-42: so // de dag nyon mongs med pas 'grub //
T02D1407:140a-46: de'i don ni de ltar bshad zin to //

T02D1407:140b-2: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //

T02D1407:140b-8: dh'u t'i ni de dag sel ba ste /
T02D1407:140b-9: res na aa wa dh'u t'i ni 'bar ba'i ma
T02D1407:140b-10: lta bu'i rang bzhin can bdag rnal 'byor pa de'i'o

T02D1407:140b-12: de'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas shing bstan to zhes pa'o don to //
T02D1407:140b-13: de'i sbyor ba'i phyir na rnal 'byor pa de de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D1407:140b-14: de gang zhes pa ni smin ma'i bar zhes pa
T02D1407:140b-15: ni 'di lta ste zla ba dang ldan pa'i padma'i

T02D1407:140b-23: bza' ba zhes pa ni dngos po 'dis so //
T02D1407:140b-25: bsreg bya lnga zhes pa 'di ste /
T02D1407:140b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag par ro //
T02D1407:140b-27: dgu ru bsreg ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1407:140b-29: bzhi bcu rtsa lngar bsreg par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1407:140b-31: shin tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1407:140b-32: de yis blta ba ba ni /

T02D1407:140b-34: zhes pa la ste mthong bya zhes pa ni sngags so //
T02D1407:140b-35: 'khor lo de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1407:140b-36: kun nas sgo zhes pa ni khams gsum ma lus
T02D1407:140b-37: pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi lhag pa'i lha ste rang
T02D1407:140b-38: byung ba'o // zhal bzhi pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1407:140b-39: pa ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor ro
T02D1407:140b-40: byung ba'o // // dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gnas la'o //

T02D1407:141a-6: dum skyes ma yin phyi rol sbyin //

T02D1407:141a-11: gzugs ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1407:141a-17: dngos grub thams cad 'grub byed yin //

T02D1407:141a-22: de la 'od zer bye bas kun du gang ba la sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'phro ba can no //
T02D1407:141a-23: thig le'i rnal 'byor de rdzogs nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1407:141a-24: rigs kyi rim pas h'um las mtshan ma'i dbus su dkyil 'khor nam mkhar gsal zhing rgya che ba /
T02D1407:141a-25: rgyal ba rin po che'i bzhugs gnas bde ba chen
T02D1407:141a-26: po shin tu phra ba'i gzugs rdul phra mo tsam
T02D1407:141a-27: du bsdus par lus pa med pa'i sems can rnams

T02D1407:141a-31: 'byung ba dang rngub pas sems brtan zhing rab tu bsdus pas 'dar ba dang /

T02D1407:141b-0: rdo rje snying po chen po'o zhes gsungs par dgongs @141b so //

T02D1407:141b-26: zhes pa 'di ni zhi ba la sogs pa'o //

T02D1407:142a-2: zhes pa ni gang zhig yi ge h'um rab tu gnas par dgug cing gzhug par bya'o //
